contentList.content: You cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fireball">Fireball</LSTag> centered on yourself.
Your spells deal an additionl [1] per spell level.
Your weapon <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attacks</LSTag> deal an additional [1].
Afflicted with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CONFUSION">Confusion</LSTag>. You are hostile to everyone, wander around aimlessly, and occasionally skip turns in your stupor.
At the start of your turn regain [1].
You cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Grease">Grease</LSTag> centered on yourself.
All other creatures in a [1] radius of you have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_FaerieFire">Faerie Fire</LSTag> centered on yourself.
You have summoned a hostile spectator!

You have summoned a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TAD_MIND_SANCTUARY_AURA">Mind Sanctuary Bubble</LSTag> centered on yourself and can use <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ActionPoint">Actions</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Actions</LSTag> interchangeably.

You are compelled to always tell the truth. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Deception">Deception</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill Checks</LSTag>.
You are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BANISHED">Banish</LSTag> to another plane of existence.
The next spell that hits does maximum damage.
You become charged with a massive amount of static electricity. When a creature hits you with a melee <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attacks</LSTag>, you deal [1] to them.
You <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charm</LSTag> any creature that hits you with an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attack</LSTag>.
Any creature that hits you with a melee <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attacks</LSTag> is pushed back by [1].
You have advantage on all <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.

Yourself and all allies within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> may be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINK">Blinked</LSTag> out of existence at the end of their turns.
All non-hostile creatures within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> are afflicted with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIENDS">Friends</LSTag>.
You have a distracting headache is making it difficult to think clearly. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> is reduced by 2.
You regain all of your expended Level 1 <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slots</LSTag>.
Your body starts to glow and emits a light that eliminates darkness within [1].

All other creatures within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> take [2]. Creatures that succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> take halved damage.
All creatures within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag>.
You are <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> against Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage.

All other creatures within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> must succeed on a <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or becomed <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag>.

You glow brightly in a [1]. Enemies within [2] of you become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WILD_MAGIC_ATTEMPT_BLINDNESS">Blinded</LSTag>. When this <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WILD_MAGIC_ATTEMPT_BLINDNESS">Blindness</LSTag> is removed from a creature they become <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to it.
You are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POLYMORPH_SHEEP">Polymorphed</LSTag> into a sheep.
You have summoned a hostile Owlbear.
You have summoned a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MINOR_ILLUSION">Minor Illusion</LSTag>.
All hostile creatures within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DEATH_WARD">Death Ward</LSTag>.

All other creatures within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> take [2], or half as much damage with a successful <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>. You regain [3] equal to half the total damage dealt.
You cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_MirrorImage">Mirror Image</LSTag> on yourself.
All creatures within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FLY">Flight</LSTag>.
You are able to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Teleportation_Revivify">Revivify</LSTag> until your next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.

All creatures within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENLARGE">Enlarged</LSTag>. They gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>, their weapon <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attacks</LSTag> deal an additional 1d4 damage.

All creatures within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="REDUCE">Reduced</LSTag>. They suffer <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>, their weapon <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attacks</LSTag> deal 1d4 less damage.
All creatures within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> become <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to [2].
Wild Magic: Curse of the Clown

You are cursed to become a clown. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> is increased by 1, up to a maximum 20, and you have <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immunity</LSTag> to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_HideousLaughter">Tasha's Hideous Laughter</LSTag>.
You gain another <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ActionPoint">Action</LSTag> until the end of combat.
You regain all expended <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="SorceryPoint">Sorcery Points</LSTag>.
You regain all expended <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="RagePoint">Rage Charges</LSTag>.
All other creatures within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HASTE">Hastened</LSTag>.
All doors and chests within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> are temporarily locked.
All mundane locks within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> are unlocked.
You have summoned a menagerie of familiars.
All of your <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attacks</LSTag> are <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag>.

You can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_DetectThoughts">Detect Thoughts</LSTag>, but others can read your thoughts too. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Intimidation">Intimidation</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Deception">Deception</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Persuasion">Persuasion</LSTag>, and <LSTag Tooltip="Performance">Performance</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SkillCheck">Skill Checks</LSTag>.

At the start of your next turn, all creatures within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> will become <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to a random damage type.
All creatures within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> are <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Acid damage.
All creatures within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> are <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Cold damage.
All creatures within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> are <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Fire damage.
All creatures within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> are <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Force damage.
All creatures within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> are <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Lightning damage.
All creatures within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> are <LSTag Tooltip="Vulnerable">Vulnerable</LSTag> to Necrotic Damage.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Spell Attacks</LSTag> deal an additional [1] per spell level in a [2] radius of the target. Creatures that succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> take halved damage.
The next time you are healed, you regain all of your missing <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>.
For every 500 gold you have in your inventory you take [1].

You have summoned Percy, the Pacifist Kobold. Percy can cast the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Sanctuary">Sanctuary</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Heroism">Heroism</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_HealingWord">Healing Word</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Resistance">Resistance</LSTag> spells.

If this creature lands an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attacks</LSTag>, they explode in a [1] radius, dealing [2] to all entities in the blast. Creatures that succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> take halved damage.

All creatures within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> must succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FEARED">Fearful</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISARM">Disarmed</LSTag>.
You have summoned six hostile crabs.
You have summoned Bob the Friendly Zombie.

You are cursed with Vampirism! You gain access to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Bite_Vampire">Bite</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Claws_Vampire">Claws</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_CharmPerson_Vampire">Charm Person</LSTag>. Your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> increases by 1, up to a maximum of 20.
You are transformed into a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GASEOUS_FORM">Gaseous Form</LSTag>.
A rainstorm starts above you, anything underneath the storm becomes wet.
You become <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to fire; You are also on fire, and it cannot be put out.

You temporarily gain the powers of a Storm Sorcerer. You gain <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="HeartOfTheStorm">Heart of the Storm</LSTag>, and have access to the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_Thunderwave">Thunderwave</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_CreateDestroyWater">Create or Destroy Water</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_GustOfWind">Gust of Wind</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_SleetStorm">Sleet Storm</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_CallLightning">Call Lightning</LSTag> spells.
At the start of your next turn, one of your <LSTag Tooltip="Abilities">Abilities</LSTag> will temporarily be reduced by 5.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> has been decreased by 5.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> has been decreased by 5.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> has been decreased by 5.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> has been decreased by 5.
At the start of your next turn, one of your <LSTag Tooltip="Abilities">Abilities</LSTag> will temporarily be increased by 5, up to a maximum of 20.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> has been increased by 5, up to a maximum of 20.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> has been increased by 5, up to a maximum of 20.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> has been increased by 5, up to a maximum of 20.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> has been increased by 5, up to a maximum of 20.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> has been increased by 5, up to a maximum of 20.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> has been increased by 5, up to a maximum of 20.
All other creatures within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISARMED">Disarmed</LSTag>.

All enemies within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> must succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>.
All allies within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> are <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Help">Helped</LSTag>.
All creatures within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FREEDOM_OF_MOVEMENT">Freedom of Movement</LSTag>.
Your blood is highly flammable and will explode when it comes in contact with fire.

All enemies within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> are afflicted with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="IRRESISTIBLE_DANCE">Otto's Irresistible Dance</LSTag>.
You have summoned a friendly spectator.

Your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> is temporarily increased by 4. Following a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>, this benefit ends and your <LSTag Tooltip="Intelligence">Intelligence</LSTag> is instead reduced by 2. Either condition is removed following a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
You cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_HeroesFeast">Heroes' Feast</LSTag> centered on yourself.
Wild Magic: Mass Wild Magic Surge

All creatures within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> trigger a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> at the beginning of their next turn.

All enemies within [1] of the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout__WildMagic">Wild Magic Surge</LSTag> must succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POLYMORPH_SHEEP">Polymorphed</LSTag> into sheep.
